statements: DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_id = 100 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND amount > 500;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount < 1000 AND transaction_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' AND expiry_date < DATE '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM user_payments WHERE user_id = 100 AND method_id = 3;
